# tiempo

> A lightweight datetime utility library for timezone conversions, formatting, and date math built on the Temporal API.

tiempo provides a familiar date-fns-style API while leveraging the modern Temporal API for precision you can trust. It supports 400+ IANA timezones, nanosecond precision, DST-safe arithmetic, and immutable operations.

## Docs

- [Introduction](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs): Overview of tiempo and key features
- [Installation](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/installation): Getting started with tiempo in your project
- [TypeScript](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/typescript): Type-safe datetime handling with timezone autocomplete

## Conversion

- [toZonedTime](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/conversion/to-zoned-time): Convert UTC/Date to timezone-aware ZonedDateTime
- [toUtc](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/conversion/to-utc): Convert ZonedDateTime back to UTC Instant
- [toDate](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/conversion/to-date): Convert Temporal types to JavaScript Date
- [toIso](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/conversion/to-iso): Convert to ISO 8601 string format
- [toIso9075](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/conversion/to-iso9075): Convert to SQL-compatible ISO 9075 format

## Current Time

- [now](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/current-time/now): Get current time as ZonedDateTime in a timezone
- [today](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/current-time/today): Get today's date as PlainDate in a timezone

## Formatting

- [format](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/formatting/format): Format dates with date-fns-like tokens (yyyy, MM, dd, etc.)
- [simpleFormat](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/formatting/simple-format): Simple formatting with common patterns
- [formatPlainDate](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/formatting/format-plain-date): Format PlainDate values
- [intlFormatDistance](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/formatting/intl-format-distance): Relative time formatting ("2 days ago")

## Arithmetic

- [addYears](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/add-years): Add years to a datetime
- [addMonths](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/add-months): Add months to a datetime
- [addWeeks](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/add-weeks): Add weeks to a datetime
- [addDays](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/add-days): Add days to a datetime (DST-safe)
- [addHours](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/add-hours): Add hours to a datetime
- [addMinutes](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/add-minutes): Add minutes to a datetime
- [addSeconds](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/add-seconds): Add seconds to a datetime
- [subYears](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/sub-years): Subtract years from a datetime
- [subMonths](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/sub-months): Subtract months from a datetime
- [subWeeks](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/sub-weeks): Subtract weeks from a datetime
- [subDays](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/sub-days): Subtract days from a datetime
- [subHours](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/sub-hours): Subtract hours from a datetime
- [subMinutes](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/sub-minutes): Subtract minutes from a datetime
- [subSeconds](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/sub-seconds): Subtract seconds from a datetime

## Boundaries

- [startOfDay](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/boundaries/start-of-day): Get start of day (00:00:00)
- [endOfDay](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/boundaries/end-of-day): Get end of day (23:59:59.999999999)
- [startOfWeek](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/boundaries/start-of-week): Get start of week
- [endOfWeek](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/boundaries/end-of-week): Get end of week
- [startOfMonth](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/boundaries/start-of-month): Get first moment of the month
- [endOfMonth](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/boundaries/end-of-month): Get last moment of the month
- [startOfYear](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/boundaries/start-of-year): Get first moment of the year
- [endOfYear](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/boundaries/end-of-year): Get last moment of the year

## Comparison

- [isBefore](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/comparison/is-before): Check if datetime is before another
- [isAfter](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/comparison/is-after): Check if datetime is after another
- [isFuture](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/comparison/is-future): Check if datetime is in the future
- [isPast](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/comparison/is-past): Check if datetime is in the past
- [isSameDay](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/comparison/is-same-day): Check if two datetimes are the same day
- [isSameWeek](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/comparison/is-same-week): Check if two datetimes are in the same week
- [isSameMonth](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/comparison/is-same-month): Check if two datetimes are in the same month
- [isSameYear](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/comparison/is-same-year): Check if two datetimes are in the same year

## Difference

- [differenceInYears](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/difference/difference-in-years): Get difference in years
- [differenceInMonths](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/difference/difference-in-months): Get difference in months
- [differenceInWeeks](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/difference/difference-in-weeks): Get difference in weeks
- [differenceInDays](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/difference/difference-in-days): Get difference in days
- [differenceInHours](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/difference/difference-in-hours): Get difference in hours
- [differenceInMinutes](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/difference/difference-in-minutes): Get difference in minutes
- [differenceInSeconds](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/difference/difference-in-seconds): Get difference in seconds

## Utilities

- [browserTimezone](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/utilities/browser-timezone): Get the browser's current IANA timezone

## Optional

- [addMilliseconds](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/add-milliseconds): Add milliseconds to a datetime
- [addMicroseconds](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/add-microseconds): Add microseconds to a datetime
- [addNanoseconds](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/add-nanoseconds): Add nanoseconds to a datetime
- [subMilliseconds](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/sub-milliseconds): Subtract milliseconds from a datetime
- [subMicroseconds](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/sub-microseconds): Subtract microseconds from a datetime
- [subNanoseconds](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/arithmetic/sub-nanoseconds): Subtract nanoseconds from a datetime
- [differenceInMilliseconds](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/difference/difference-in-milliseconds): Get difference in milliseconds
- [differenceInMicroseconds](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/difference/difference-in-microseconds): Get difference in microseconds
- [differenceInNanoseconds](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/difference/difference-in-nanoseconds): Get difference in nanoseconds
- [isSameHour](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/comparison/is-same-hour): Check if two datetimes are in the same hour
- [isSameMinute](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/comparison/is-same-minute): Check if two datetimes are in the same minute
- [isSameSecond](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/comparison/is-same-second): Check if two datetimes are in the same second
- [isSameMillisecond](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/comparison/is-same-millisecond): Check if two datetimes are in the same millisecond
- [isSameMicrosecond](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/comparison/is-same-microsecond): Check if two datetimes are in the same microsecond
- [isSameNanosecond](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/comparison/is-same-nanosecond): Check if two datetimes are in the same nanosecond
- [isPlainDateBefore](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/comparison/is-plain-date-before): Check if PlainDate is before another
- [isPlainDateAfter](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/comparison/is-plain-date-after): Check if PlainDate is after another
- [isPlainDateEqual](https://eng.gobrand.app/tiempo/docs/comparison/is-plain-date-equal): Check if two PlainDates are equal
